      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PolicyPeriodBuilder effectiveTodayForFiveDays()
      Sets the effective date as one business day from today (to avoid falling on a non-business day) and the expiration date as five business days from today
      PolicyPeriodBuilder onPolicy(Policy policy)
      adds this PolicyPeriod to policy and configures this builder's - PolicyType, - PolicyPeriodType, - PolicyNumber, - EffectiveDate, and - ExpirationDate based on policy
